languages.text: "Ооо, рыжая. Сдается мне, если верить моим голоскам-шепоткам, "зло" не в полной мере описывает то, что на уме у тощего..."
"Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."
languages.original_text: "Ооо, рыжая. Сдается мне, если верить моим голоскам-шепоткам, "зло" не в полной мере описывает то, что на уме у тощего..."

traits.locale_text: "Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."

languages.text: “噢，小红毛，如果我那些小小的低语者说的是实话，那‘邪恶’这个词，恐怕完全不足以形容那只竹节虫的思想……”
languages.original_text: "Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."

traits.locale_text: “噢，小红毛，如果我那些小小的低语者说的是实话，那‘邪恶’这个词，恐怕完全不足以形容那只竹节虫的思想……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Oooh, ma belle, si j'en crois mes petites voix, les pensées de ce misérable insecte vont bien au-delà de la simple malveillance... »
languages.original_text: "Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."

traits.locale_text: « Oooh, ma belle, si j'en crois mes petites voix, les pensées de ce misérable insecte vont bien au-delà de la simple malveillance... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Oooh, Roja, si mis susurros dicen la verdad, "pérfido" se queda muy corto para describir lo que ese insecto tiene en mente...».
languages.original_text: "Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."

traits.locale_text: «Oooh, Roja, si mis susurros dicen la verdad, "pérfido" se queda muy corto para describir lo que ese insecto tiene en mente...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁー、レッド、私のささやき声が信じるなら、あのナナフシの心の中は”邪悪”なんて言葉では言い表せないわ…」
languages.original_text: "Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁー、レッド、私のささやき声が信じるなら、あのナナフシの心の中は”邪悪”なんて言葉では言い表せないわ…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Oooh, Rote, wenn man meinen kleinen Flüsterern Glauben schenken darf, kommt 'böse' den Gedanken der Stabheuschrecke nicht einmal annähernd nahe ..."
languages.original_text: "Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."

languages.original_text: "Oooh, Red, if my little whisperers are to be believed, 'evil' doesn't come close to describing what's on that stick insect's mind..."

languages.text: "Kızıl be... Minik fısıldayanlarımın dediği doğruysa o dal böceğinin düşündükleri, Şerbaşı'nın bile aklına gelmez..."
